title: patch stuck on 32% help please!
body:
hey guys so i've just tried to update LoL & everytime i get to 32% it comes up saying "update failed" so i went "send reports" then it asked me to install "direct play" i think it was called, i did that & reopened the patcher & then the same thing still happened :/

has anyone had the same problem? or does anyone have any clue how to fix it?

thank you for reading :)

replies.body:
I had that issue. Are you still experiencing it? Have you tried the ol' [changing your DNS route](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq4) yet?

And who's your OS and ISP?
doesn't seem to be working :( i tried the link of changing the DNS that you sent

That's exactly what happened to me.

Oh yeah, I'm having the issue again. The changing DNS only worked temporarily. So, now we can try fixing this **together**.

I can confirm that releasing/renewing your IP won't work. Going to try using a VPN, because that also worked previously (though I didn't like its malicious intents.)

Edit: Didn't work, as expected. Don't try it yourself. It's literally the same as changing DNS. I sent in a support ticket about three days ago, and still haven't gotten anything back about it. I'll message here if there's a solution.
